website_summaries.verdict: This pack of 4 chic knit stockings will add a touch of class to the mantle.
pros: Look like high-end stockings (think Pottery Barn or Ugg) at a fraction of the cost
Stretchy knit will accommodate a lot of gifts
Comes in 18- and 14-inch sizes and a choice of all ivory, or 2 ivory and 2 burgundy, or a set of 2 burgundy stockings
cons: Width of the opening on the smaller size is narrow

customer_reviews.title: "You can't wear them!"
customer_reviews.text: We thought these were constructed very well (nice and thick) and felt the lining added strength and kept them from stretching strangely. If you plan to put heavy stuff in them, then they may lose their shape but they worked great for us. Our daughter and daughter's in law liked them so much they wanted to wear them. My wife and I responded in unison, "You can't wear them!" But if it gets real cold this winter, we won't have any trouble getting them out and using them to keep our feet warm!
customer_reviews.author: Gantenbein

customer_reviews.title: Simply Beautiful for an Exceptional Value
customer_reviews.text: These stockings are extremely well made and the cable knitting is beautiful. Dual-sided pattern allows you to hang in either direction. They have more than exceeded my expectations. The sizing matches exactly as advertised; however, I will say I should have measured the opening of our previous stockings... the width of these is much smaller than what we’re used to. They do have some stretch, but not significant stretch, perhaps an extra inch. For me, the value of the product outweighs this slight con. The vendor packaged my order with care, even leaving a handwritten thank you. Highly recommend... but maybe measure out 5” for sizing clarity beforehand.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping, next day delivery. These stockings are awesome. They are just the perfect size. I ordered the 18”. Great value, worth the price. $15 for 3 cant beat that, other stores you’d spend at least $35-$40 for 3. The only thing is that one of the stocking had a pretty decent snag, but i just flipped it, good thing the pattern is on both sides so it can be hidden
customer_reviews.author: Diana Mercado

customer_reviews.title: Amazing deal and gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: These stockings are such a good deal! I got a pack of four and then bought a two pack the next day cause I was blown away by how cute they were and the price is amazing! They have a lining on the inside and are fairly stretchy but not easily messed up.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Luciano

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I have looked for similar stockings for so long but never found anything that wasn't at least $30 each! I got the 18" 2 pack initially because inwamtednto inspect the quality before I ordered more. Guys, not kidding, flawless. The knitting looks great, the material doesn't feel cheap in any way, they look elegant and cozy and sturdy. They're lined and thick and will hold lots of Chrostmas goodies while looking great hung up. So happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: M.B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of skeptical about ordering because i thought they would be small but they are the perfect size! I also got a cute gift with it as well , highly recommend buying this! I added the ornaments outside of the stocking the pan next to it for size measuring idea the pan is 17.25x11.5x1 in
customer_reviews.author: ashley covarrubias

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these stockings surprised me. They are well made and beautiful. I love the size as well. I’ve seen some people say that they are too small but I disagree. They are good sized and what’s more, they are very stretchy. I’m e cited to use them this year!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Just okay but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Wondering if I got the "od version" because mine are short and skinny, not thicker like the newer version ones indicate. But the colors are nice. They are small, more for decoration is what we figured we would use them for. The strings are not sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly0209

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and price!!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute stockings, great quality, craftsmanship, and price. I am so impressed. These are better than store bough stockings. I would highly recommend! Thank you Kristen for the hairband gift with my order. I love it and the stockings!!❤❤
customer_reviews.author: Beckie Volbright

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Consistent
customer_reviews.text: I bought 6 of these last year, but the birth of two more grandbabies led me to purchase 2 more for this year! I appreciate the fact that last year's purchase and this year's purchase were consistent. I can hang them together and no one will be able to tell the difference. Same great look, color and size. They do arrive a bit misshapen because of packing and shipping, but that easily settles out after a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute! Great for display purposes.
customer_reviews.text: The stockings are super cute and the perfect size for our mantle. Because they are a little small to use for Christmas items (unless they are small products), these are more for decoration purposes, which is why I bought them. I stuffed them with dish towels and they look like Santa already came! Even better, the seller was so sweet to add a hand written thank you note and include a little surprise headband, which I’ve already worn. If you’re looking to use these for decoration as opposed to functionally to stuff with toys, these are for you!
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality at a very affordable price
customer_reviews.text: I have used the same stocking for over 25 years and have been looking for something new. Since my family are all die-hard Texas A&M Aggies, I new I wanted burgundy. I saw these and loved not only the rich color but the cable knit pattern and the fact that they were lined. I look forward to using these for many years. There are currently five members of my family, but I bought 8 because we are adding a new son-in-law in December. I also have two sons who will one day need the extras for new daughter-in-laws.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little afraid of what the quality of these would be because the price was so good but they are wonderful. Nice size, wonderfully shaped, thick and hang great! I am thinking of getting some more and using them to "wrap" gifts in. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: My kids and I love these Christmas stockings! I was looking for the perfect size to match my new color theme and they are perfect! We just moved into a new house that sadly no longer have a fireplace and needed the right fit for the stocking holder. The quality is amazing and stretchy enough for Santa to fill them up too! Thank You Kristen for the extra gift in the package too!!
customer_reviews.author: BlueEyedMum

customer_reviews.title: Adorable stockings
customer_reviews.text: These stockings are absolutely adorable! They’re great quality and I love the design on them. They’d be great for yourself or a gift. Plus you get three of them together! Would buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful stockings
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought a package of six of these. I liked them so much that I went ahead and bought two more to have as backup next year and after that. They are nice yarn and hold a fair amount of stuffers.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Y.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than average. Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 14” and the reviews weren’t joking, they are small! But the look cute and are a little wide so it works. The quality is great, consistent with reviews. Overall happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christina J Dabbagh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Stockings
customer_reviews.text: Good price, even better quality. Fast shipping! Seller sent a cute headband and handwritten note in the package. Good size. Inside has lining. Stretchy & fits a lot more than it looks like it does! Would buy again! 11/10 Thank you :)
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Romero

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT! These things are so expensive in stores and I am so excited I got there for so cheap! The quality is awesome too!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Westmoreland

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely nothing negative to say, they are very beautiful. I even received a hand written note and a free gift. Thank you 😊
customer_reviews.author: chris & bella G

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. The seller (Kristine) is super nice, she sent me a headband that I wear everyday 🤍
customer_reviews.author: Shaima

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in December to fill for my family. Surprisingly, a lot of things fit in it. And by a lot I mean a lot of small things. They are very nicely made and hold up pretty well. I recommend stuffing the end with paper to hold shape, but they looked very nice with the rest of my decorations.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two stockings to just hang for decoration. They are super cute and just what I wanted. Very reasonably priced too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price =)
customer_reviews.text: They are very soft and the colors match the picture perfectly. They are a little oddly shaped but theyre cute and a good value for the money. Arrived fast and had a surprise gift with a hand written note in the shape of a heart, so cute! Would buy again and recommend to friends/family.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Lohr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: These are just beautiful! Well made, fully lined. Nice and thick. High quality. I don’t usually take the time to write reviews but these stockings are winners.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria108

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for Christmas! Absolutely beautiful and will look great above my fireplace. They’re very well made and will be of great use for what I need them for.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: So cute, well made & unlike many woven stockings she puts a liner inside the stocking so you can add many gifts. A really nice length. At any other store, these are over $50 each. Plus she adds a cute gift & a personal note to the package. Great touch! Just love them. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: lainie ortman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow! These stockings exceeded my expectations. She does NOT charge enough. First of all, I didn’t realize they were hand made. They’re gorgeously done, very durable, with a nice lining on the inside. I’m so glad I pulled the trigger and got these. Definitely five stars all around.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Ann Neff

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful material! Exactly what I was expecting. Nice thick knit and soft yarn. Looks wonderful on the mantel! Lined with fabric to protect the inside of the knit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Addition to my Mantle this Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: I never leave Amazon reviews but this arrived with a handwritten note asking to leave a review and ... in the spirit of Christmas how can I not? These stockings came super fast and in superior condition! They are cozy, sturdy and well made -- the perfect addition to my Christmas mantle! The price was amazing! I was looking at similar ones at Target for $14.99 each! What a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Van

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for something simple and made well (note they are not reversible)
customer_reviews.text: I almost returned these because I didn't realize that they were not reversible (it has a distinct front and back). As you can see in my photo, I am actually hanging the back side (i.e. the braiding doesn't show) in order to work with my other stockings from West Elm (which are also not reversible). Ultimately, I decided to keep these because the knit is lovely and the overall quality is very good. Also, the customer service is excellent. My order came fast and questions were answered.
customer_reviews.author: Christine McGee

customer_reviews.title: Definitely get these stockings
customer_reviews.text: YOU WANT TO BUY THESE STOCKINGS!!! My family and I could not love these stockings more. The quality is easily equal to something that you would find at pottery barn. They are lined and the 18” are the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Knight

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in every way. It was the perfect decor I was looking for. The seller even included a hand written note which is always such a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: SHC

customer_reviews.title: Incredible quality! Buy these!!
customer_reviews.text: These may be the best thing I’ve ever bought on amazon. I can’t believe the quality of these for the price! I am so impressed! Do not hesitate! Buy these! They are clearly hand made and snuggle soft.
customer_reviews.author: JJohnson

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: These stockings are so cute and well made. They come with a hook to hang them and the colors are as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Long Island

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Super good quality, these will last me years! The stitching is even better in person!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Mendonca

customer_reviews.title: Treasures!
customer_reviews.text: Marvelous quality, fast shipping, and a handwritten thank you note with a gift from the seller. Above and beyond.
customer_reviews.author: panic

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Product
customer_reviews.text: The stockings did not disappoint. They are top quality and a great size. They look like a cable knit sweater. They are perfect for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: fire911

customer_reviews.title: A 5 star purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these stockings! I’m very happy with my purchase. I will be buying again. I definitely recommend these for anyone looking for stockings. I bought the 18” and there was a personal touch in the package...a nice little note from an actual person who made them as well as cute little, holiday washi tape rolls!! :)
customer_reviews.author: KTJane

customer_reviews.title: Nice stockings
customer_reviews.text: These are nice stockings. I got the 18 inch and they are close to a standard size you’d see in the stores. The 14 inch would be better for a child’s stocking.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and functional.
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable! They’re well made. They have no inner lining like advertised, but that’s fine! They’re cutely knit. It’s a perfect size for the type of stocking stuffers I give! There was a nice surprise note and adorable headband. Would definitely buy again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small
customer_reviews.text: I got what I paid for. They are cute but a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Stolworthy

customer_reviews.title: Christmas stocking
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and look nice hung up. I wish they were just a little bit wider but the quality is good. So I’m happy overall with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love these stockings! I purchased two cream colored 14” stockings due to the low height of my tv stand. I bought beautiful stocking holders and just needed stockings that wouldn’t hit the floor. These look handmade and are good quality! I haven’t put anything in them yet so I’m not sure if they string they are on will hold well, if not I will reinforce.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Nasr

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 sets of 2 of the "ivory stockings," 6 total with 3 different designs and all looked great. I will say that the "ivory" looks a little bit more tan or a little darker than off white than I was expecting, but over all looks great.
customer_reviews.author: aaron e

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 🎄
customer_reviews.text: I love these stockings. The colors are beautiful and the shipping was fast! I LOVE Christmas and these are just perfect. They even came with a sweet hand written note! Best thing I have ordered for Christmas this year :)
customer_reviews.author: MATTHEW HANSON

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: So cute, so soft and just perfect! I honestly feel like they look better in person then online!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: They were beautiful and looked great with our other stockings. Well made. They fit plenty in them. Perfect for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package, I could immediately sense the care and craftsmanship put into this product. Beautifully crafted with extra love. I even got a hand-written note and small gift to go with the product!! So cute. I’m so happy with my choice of products! Thank you for making my apartment feel a little more like home this Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: They are the cutest. A little smaller than I expected but perfect at this price point. The seller was amazing and sent a little gift inside for us. I would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color and size
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute! They got here earlier than I thought they would and they are so soft and exactly what we were hoping for. The seller even included a beautiful necklace as a bonus gift! How thoughtful! I definitely recommend these stockings!
customer_reviews.author: MH Monroe

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I love these stockings! It was the perfect price for what I was wanting and it was hard to find sets of 3 so these were a great find and deal! I love them and have received many compliments on them!
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Streigle

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality for a great price. Seller also left a cute handwritten card. These Christmas stockings are such an awesome addition to our decorations. You can tell they were made and packed with love and care. So beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These stockings are so beautifully made and a fraction of the cost compared to the big box stores. They are soft and cozy and exactly what I was looking for. The hand written note and small gift were a thoughtful and lovely gesture. Thanks so much for a high quality product and your personal touch!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I loved them super cute nice material. And it came with a cute head band for free and a sweet note!
customer_reviews.author: Trista Krizenesky

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect stockings! I hung them in my living room above the tv and I love them. Also, the seller is so nice and even sent a little extra gift and a note! It was a nice little surprise and put a smile on my face. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very cute for my neutral Christmas decor. And they came with a handwritten note, which was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Cranmer

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY!!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely the best bang for your buck. What i didnt know when i ordered them was that they were handmade 😊😊. They came with a gift and a handwritten note!! Such good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: These stocking are adorable and look perfect in the living room! The seller, Kristen, even threw in a super cute complimentary headband! Highly recommend! Also, the steps shown how to make the stockings look like the picture were great! Definitely a great suggestion.
customer_reviews.author: jacquelyn smith

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved the stocking, the colors are vibrant and very good material. They were a little smaller then I expected but honestly I don’t mind at all there great and totally recommend buying them. She also threw in a little gift which It was so thoughtful!!
customer_reviews.author: Dayanara

customer_reviews.title: Good buy! Nice seller!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality stockings and a perfect size to put a bunch of items in. Seller included a beautiful silk knotted headband, too!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna C.

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, lined, sturdy. I enjoy and appreciate hand crafted items. I ordered the cream colored ones.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Mead

customer_reviews.title: Quality stockings for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sweet and cozy Christmas stockings! The price is great for the quality and especially getting TWO stockings. Also, there was a cute little hand written note thanking me for my purchase and some cute Christmas tree wasa tape... i am VERY pleased and i know if you buy these stockings you will love them too! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality but doesn’t have a stocking shape
customer_reviews.text: My only issue is the stocking shape. I love the color and how it’s double sided but it looks a mess as it doesn’t have a heal .. maybe i will try to weight down the heal.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Martin

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: These are classic looking, well made, and moderately sized stockings...also very happy with the customer service
customer_reviews.author: Laura Miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice Christmas stocking
customer_reviews.text: Well made stockings. I used them for a decor accent to hang from my mud room cubby hooks for Christmas and they looked great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These stockings are well-made, beautiful, and sturdy. For decorative purposes, they were perfect. However, I wouldn't stuff them with gifts - they aren't as large as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful stockings for a great price
customer_reviews.text: These turned out great! Was scared they wouldn’t come in on time, but came a day early. Great size and they are lined too! The seller was so sweet and even wrote in a personal note. Thanks Kristen!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product, Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: These stockings are exactly what one would hope for in Christmas stockings. Beautiful, well-made, true to color and size; perfect for decoration and/or "stocking stuffers." No discolorations, loose threats, or misshapen bits. Really great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Brady

customer_reviews.title: Great quality AND Great Price. Hard to beat!
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine last night! I ordered and received them the same day. They are a GREAT quality and such a good price. We even got very cute gifts inside that my daughter wore to school today. I highly recommend these. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome stockings
customer_reviews.text: I love these stockings for what I paid im totally impressed with the quality ....she enclosed a small gift with them dont know what it is but it was a sweet jesture!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love these, best price I have found and they seem pretty durable. They did seem kinda small at first, but I believe you can fit a lot in them and they will stretch a little in time.
customer_reviews.author: kelli

customer_reviews.title: Steal!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for that farmhouse look for a reasonable price and these were perfect!! What a deal!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I didn’t need very big stockings, it’s just me, my boyfriend and my cat, and these are the perfect size and they’re soft!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Brown

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these stockings! The colors are great together. You can fluff them up a bit after unpacking. They are just the right size not too big or too small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely stockings
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Thank you for the gift that was included in my purchase. Have a wonderful holiday!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, natural look. Smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: These are cute stockings, however, they did not have a lining as implied. I ordered the 14” size due to having a small faux fireplace, but could have used the larger size. I do like the natural look with solid color.
customer_reviews.author: chad reaves

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Got these for me and my boyfriend’s first Christmas. Looks exactly like the pictures
customer_reviews.author: Mak

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these stockings and they’re simply gorgeous they are made very well they even have a lining great value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Alliyah F.

customer_reviews.title: Nicely crafted stockings that add charm to any fireplace mantle.
customer_reviews.text: The stockings were the perfect touch for making our mantle decor complete. I like the fact that you could hang the stockings to the left or the right as well. I was pleasantly surprised at the quality and craftsmanship. Thank you Kristen!
customer_reviews.author: mack lugo

customer_reviews.title: 🍭Adore these Stockings!
customer_reviews.text: Ahhhhh... these puppies are perfect by the fire🔥For the price, these cable knit stockings exceeded my expectations ❤ I'm thrilled to enjoy them for years, years & years!!! Thank you Kristen for the lovely handwritten note, the stellar packaging & the free little gift too 🎁 Merry Christmas!!!
customer_reviews.author: JAMES PATTERSON

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these!! I am blown away that they cost so little for their quality. I was neevous I would get a cheap, thin looking stocking, but was definitely beyond please when I received these!!! Would definitely buy again and recommend to a friend!!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Only wish the design was on both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Nykie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: It's always hit or miss as to whether something handmade will show up looking like you were expecting, but these absolutely did. They are a good size and quality. We're excited to continue to use these for upcoming Christmases.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: The stockings are so cute! I love them! They’re exactly what I was expecting and arrived quickly:)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these stockings! They are super durable which is exactly what I wanted! I also received a free headband as a gift from the shop owner! Thank you, Kristen ☺️
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Redmon

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These stockings are absolutely perfect! They are wonderful quality, and the best size. They remind me of my childhood Christmas mornings, and I’m thrilled to now share those same experiences with my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful. I can not wait to hang them on my fireplace
customer_reviews.author: Jacklyn S.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: These stockings are adorable! Good quality especially for the price. They’re a bit smaller than I anticipated but that could have simply been my own error in judgement after reading the measurements. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Lexie W.

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these products. I bought these two for my new home and they fit so perfect on top of my mantle. I am super satisfied with the quality, length and price. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, well made stockings...love them! Nice upgrade from Dollar store stockings lol

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful item!

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous. Good quality! They are thick and a beautiful color.
customer_reviews.author: Matt G

customer_reviews.title: Great Product For The Price!
customer_reviews.text: These stockings are very well made. They look just like the picture and are perfect for the holidays. Plus, the came packaged with a gift and handwritten note from the seller! Would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great stockings for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Good stockings helped up well to being stuffed with goodies.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly as pictured and got it a day early! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Cute, a little misshapen at the bottom
customer_reviews.text: Cute! The bottom part of the stocking was a bit "stout" looking, misshapen. But it won't matter much since the stockings will be stuffed with gifts anyway!
customer_reviews.author: KatieG

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality with a surprise?
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect but this headband came with these. I was confused as to where it came from or why it was in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Boxer Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality. Thick with inner lining and looks expensive. Also recieved a surprise gift in the stocking from the seller which was very sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Milan Patel

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Good material not cheap at all. Super cute👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Xavier

2 x 14" heavy yarn stockings,included 4pack burgundy Christmas stockings

Features: 
1. Classic rustic cable knitted Christmas stockings.
2. Made by thick heavy woolen knitted yarn giving you an old fashion Christmas and cozy feeling. 
3.14"Christmas stockings for small gifts or decor,for you to fill candies or chocolates,watch,folding wallet,ties,gift cards,small toy cars,etc.
4.Ready to stuffed and hang on stocking hangers or mantle clips on fireplace mantel. Handmade style to create beautiful holiday memories for generations to come! Makes the perfect gift for family and friends.Great addition to holiday season decorations. 
5.WITHOUT LINING.The length is shorter than standard size 18",so the stocking will remain the shape and hold.

2.Great addition to Christmas decorations. Also a nice present for your family and friends.
3.Charming when hanging on the mantel or stairs
4.The knitted patterns are place in BOTH SIDE,you can hang it from left to right or from right to left to make your own unique Christmas decoration.
